radiographic_examinations.findings: A para-aortic mass was discovered and confirmed as a solid, encapsulated, red-brown tumor, 3.5 by 3.5 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The tumor, which was histologically similar to the previous one, recurred in 2003 and was completely resected during a second operation.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Confirmed the presence of the para-aortic mass discovered on the CT.
Repeated CT did not detect tumor recurrence.
